分別係對應hkie 嘅咩member

replies.msg:
MHKIE 對應 CEng MIET, 即係 chartered engineer
普通 MIET 只係 IET 嘅 full member
同埋 Electrical Engineer 同 Electrican 係兩回事
Electrician 係真係 get your hands dirty 果班
不過係英國，approved electrican 其實可以好好搵，因為乜電壓都做得
